Dominant_colors.Yellow: Approximately 15% (WD-40 logo, text background, bottle parts)

VISUAL ELEMENTS.Composition_type: Split-frame: Left half is a close-up of WD-40 products; right half is an overhead medium shot of organized rubber parts and labeled containers.
Main_objects_props_featured: Plastic sample containers (some with handwritten red labels: 'Air', 'WD40 SPRAY', 'WD40 SOAK')
VISUAL ELEMENTS.Background_environment: Left side: workshop or toolbench area. Right side: blue surface (possibly towel or mat), neutral and uncluttered environment.

All_text_visible_in_thumbnail: Danger: Harmful or fatal if swallowed.
Keep Out of Reach of Children.

Font_characteristics.Style: Bold, sans-serif, block letters for 'EXPERIMENTS EP2' and WD-40 branding; smaller, clean sans-serif for product details.
Font_characteristics.Emphasis: High contrast, thick borders (especially thumbnail headline); yellow/black color scheme for emphasis.
Font_characteristics.Color: Headline (EXPERIMENTS EP2) in black with thick orange background/shadow for pop. WD-40 logo in yellow/blue.

Text_placement_within_frame.Headline: Top center, spanning the frame.
Text_placement_within_frame.Brand/product_text: Prominently placed on WD-40 canisters on the left. Red writing on containers (right side, upper half).

THEMATIC ELEMENTS.Overall_emotional_tone: Curious, experimental, slightly urgent (triggers interest and safety concerns).
Visual_metaphors_or_symbols: Scientific setup (organized parts, labeled containers) to signify 'experiment.'
Juxtaposition of known product (WD-40) with raw materials (rubber parts) to symbolize testing and discovery.
Clickbait_techniques_employed: Explicit step-by-step arrangement of test items
Implied promise of dramatic results (long-term exposure test, reference to possible damage)
Brand_elements_present: WD-40 logo and canisters occupy significant visual space
Maintains WD-40 color palette and design style

THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Reinforcement_with_title: The thumbnail directly illustrates the video's premise by showing both the WD-40 product (being tested) and the various rubber parts (test subjects) with visible experiment organization. The labeled sample containers visually match the 'experiments' and 'long-term exposure' themes from the title.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Contrasts_or_mismatches: There are no significant mismatches. Both thumbnail and title are well-aligned: the visual is scientific and experimental in nature, matching the title precisely, and the focus on rubber with WD-40 is clear and unambiguous.
